mapper.insert: insert into sea_co_config (cid, cname, getlistnum, getconnum, cotype) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getlistnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{getconnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cotype,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select cid, cname, getlistnum, getconnum, cotype from sea_co_config
